Hi, my name is Erwan Goudard

About me

I've always looked for a way to unite my innate taste for logic, math and problem solving with my imperious need for creative outputs. Until pretty recently, both aspects of my personality were separated into work and private life. I graduated as a Mechanical Engineer in 2016 and since then my various interests have allowed me to work as a private teacher, a marketing intern, a sales developer and lately as a Physics teacher. On my own time i've been producing music for many years and drawing regularly, following my need to express myself creatively. It is in January 2020 that I discovered an infinite domain that would allow me to strengthen my problem-solving skills while creating beautiful and esthetic designs: Web Development.

Luckily, during my engineering schooling, I had already been programming a lot, in Matlab and Python mostly. With that in mind, in order to be able to create beautiful and interactive websites/apps, I had to build upon my basic knowledge and get the necessary web development tools. I started to learn coding through books, tutorials and online courses. In order to aquire some practical experience, I have build several projects that were part of the online courses I took, and I have to say I've loved every single minute of it. Therefore I am more than thrilled at the idea to keep learning and to be working as a Front End developer.

View Resume

Projects

Face Recognition App

This app allows you to input the url of the picture of your chosing and detects the location of face, if there is one. It then keeps count of how many faces you have detected and displays your ranking compared to other users. This project is from the zero to mastery web development course of Andrei Neagoie on Udemy. Technologies: React.js

See Live Source Code

Robofriends

This app is an interactive contact book of all your funny looking robot friends, the search bar enables you to reserch just the one you want to write to so you can get his email adress. This project is from the zero to mastery web development course of Andrei Neagoie on Udemy. Technologies: React.js

See Live Source Code

Natours company theme

This is a theme for a tourism company using pure CSS3 with creative animations. This project is from the advanced course of Jonas Schmedtmann on Udemy. Technologies: HTML, CSS, SCSS

See Live Source Code

Nexter real estate company theme

This is a website for a fictional real estate company called Nexter using pure CSS and SCSS. I built this theme when I took the advanced CSS course from Jonas Schmedtmann on Udemy. Technologies: CSS, HTML, SCSS, Font Awesome

See Live Source Code

Trillo Hotel Theme

This is a website for a fictional hotel called Trillo. I built this theme when I took the advanced CSS course from Jonas Schmedtmann on Udemy. Technologies: HTML, CSS, SCSS, SVG Icons

See Live Source Code
